prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of a (sinister elderly man:1.2), long thinning white hair, thick unkempt grey mustache, piercing glowing yellow eyes, malevolent expression, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: extremely detailed wrinkled skin, (visible age spots and liver spots:1.2), prominent facial veins, individual hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching fabric texture on hat:1.2), realistic braincase transparency, film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, smooth skin, youthful, airbrushed, low quality, friendly, (happy:1.2), clean skin
